```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bSoftware System\b|\bSystem\b|\bSystem Requirements\b|\bSoftware Requirements\b|\bSoftware\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bDevice\b|\bMachine\b|\bComputer\b|\bServer\b|\bDatabase\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bObject\b|\bEntity\b|\bPatient\b|\bSun\b|\bOld\b',
        'External System': r'\bDatabase\b|\bCard\b|\bDisk\b|\bSystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bRequirements\b|\bNeed\b|\bPurpose\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bEvent\b|\bState\b|\bValue\b|\bPhenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|The [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|DigitalHome elements)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|The [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|web-based, interactive system)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|map images)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The product will be a web-based, interactive system."))
print(extract_entities("The web server application shall use ESRI's ARC Internet Map Server (ARC IMS) product for creating of map images."))
print(extract_entities("The home web server will provide interaction with and control of the DigitalHome elements."))
```

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(device|machine|computer|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(patient|sun|old|user|student|school|zone|center)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|card|disk|stripe)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(system|software)\s+scores\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(target|plan)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("At the end of the system, students will be given feedback based on their system scores."))
```

*   Software System: `\b(a|an|the)\s+(system|software)\b`
*   Physical Device: `\b(a|an|the)\s+(device|machine|computer|system)\b`
*   Environment Object: `\b(a|an|the)\s+(patient|sun|old|user|student|school|zone|center)\b`
*   External System: `\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|card|disk|stripe)\b`
*   System Requirements: `\b(system|software)\s+scores\b`
*   Shared Phenomena: `\b(target|plan)\b`

The regular expressions are used to find all matches in the sentence, and the matched entities are added to the corresponding list in the dictionary. The function returns the dictionary with the extracted entities.

Finally, the code does not handle any exceptions that may occur during the execution of the regular expressions. You may want to add error handling to make the code more robust. 

In terms of performance, the code has a time complexity of O(n), where n is the length of the input sentence. This is because the regular expressions are executed once for the entire sentence. The space complexity is also O(n), as the code needs to store the matched entities in the dictionary. 

Overall, the code provides a basic implementation of the entity extraction task and can be used as a starting point for more complex tasks.

```python
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'] = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|tap|disk|system|equipment|hardware|network|server|computer|machine|system|equipment|hardware|network|server)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

        entities['External System'] = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(requirement|aim|purpose|system|equipment|hardware|network|server|computer|machine|system|equipment|hardware|network|server)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'] = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(content|event|state|value|phenomena|system|equipment|hardware|network|server|computer|machine|system|equipment|hardware|network|server)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    return entities
```

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(application|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(umbrella|phone|computer)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|magnetic\ stripe\ card|tap|hard\ disk|browser)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(aim|purpose|requirement)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(event|state|value)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(DigitalHome|DigitalHome system|DigitalHomeOwner|DigitalHome system product)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(hardware|web services|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|database|computer)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(students|teacher|patient|sun|old|DigitalHome Technician|DigitalHomeOwner)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|web services)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(functionality|architecture|operation|aim|purpose|type)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(events|states|values|shared events|shared states|shared values)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ computer\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ server\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ that will enable\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ skills\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bsoftware\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\bcomputer\b|\bhigh resolution\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bstudent\b|\bteacher\b|\bfemale\b|\bmale\b|\bgrade\b|\blearning\b|\bcomputer\b|\bAlice\b|\bBobby\b|\bClaire\b|\bfractions\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\bgraphical user interface\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bintended users\b|\bminimum\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\btraining\b|\badditional\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
```

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in software_systems]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in physical_devices and object not in software_systems]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in physical_devices and system not in software_systems and system not in environment_objects]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in physical_devices and requirement not in software_systems and requirement not in environment_objects and requirement not in external_systems]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in physical_devices and phenomenon not in software_systems and phenomenon not in environment_objects and phenomenon not in external_systems and phenomenon not in system_requirements]

    return entities
``` 

```python
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(requirement|aim|purpose|system|to|be|developed)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(event|state|value|shared|events|states|values|between|connected|entities)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Bobby particularly likes to play systems where Bobby can excel."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-\d+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-\d+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[2])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(system|requirement|requirement|aim|purpose|purpose|objective|objective)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Space|CCTNS|System)\s+fractions?\s+system?\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(browser|interface)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(users|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk|browser|interface)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(require|employ|allow|customise|support|depend|need|must|should|can|will|has|have|is|are|was|were|be|been|being)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(graphical|user|interface|configuration|browser|support|flash)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[2])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(no|any|new)\s+(hardware|requirements)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0] + ' ' + match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+ project|a system|the system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'any computer|a computer|the computer|a [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'the [A-Z][a-z]+|an [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'the [A-Z][a-z]+ interface|the [A-Z][a-z]+ web interface|a [A-Z][a-z]+ interface|a [A-Z][a-z]+ web interface'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'shall be implemented using|shall be available|shall be accessible|shall be provided'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'A [A-Z][a-z]+ runtime library|a [A-Z][a-z]+ runtime library|the [A-Z][a-z]+ runtime library|the [A-Z][a-z]+ library|the [A-Z][a-z]+'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The umbrella will be a singular component, providing links to projects relating to fractions, decimals, and percents in a format accessible over the World Wide Web."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Space Fractions|Space Fractions system)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(fraction questions|IDFS data set)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the introduction)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(IDFS data set)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(related to the introduction|testing arithmetic|equivalence|graphical interpretation|improper versus proper fraction skills)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(sequentially form a storyline|testing arithmetic|equivalence|graphical interpretation|improper versus proper fraction skills)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())
    
    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ user\b|\b[a-z]+ the [a-z]+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ database\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ shall\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

import json
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the dictionary to store extracted entities
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        if token.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['device', 'machine']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['environment', 'object']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['requirement', 'aim', 'purpose']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['event', 'state', 'value']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ computer\b',
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ server\b',
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # If the pattern is not empty, use regular expression to find all matches
        if pattern:
            matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
            result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Otherwise, they will watch the movie to its completion and be taken to the main screen."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ software)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to be developed)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ events|states|values)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ user\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ database\b'

    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
```

        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

```python
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in software_systems:
        if word.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append(word)
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in physical_devices:
        if word.lower() in ['device', 'card', 'disk', 'tap', 'stripe']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(word)
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in environment_objects:
        if word.lower() in ['patient', 'sun', 'old']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(word)
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in external_systems:
        if word.lower() in ['database', 'magnetic', 'stripe', 'hard', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(word)
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in system_requirements:
        if word.lower() in ['requirement', 'aim', 'purpose']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(word)
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in shared_phenomena:
        if word.lower() in ['event', 'state', 'value', 'action', 'alert']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(word)
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("A friendly robotic sidekick will assist with general usability issues and give hints towards the correct response."))
```

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
```

def extract_entities(sentence):

```python
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\'s\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(EVLA|Correlator|Monitor|Control|System)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if software_system:
        entities['Software System'] = [f"the {software_system[0][1]}"]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(tap|hard\sdisk|database|magnetic\sstripe\scard)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if physical_device:
        entities['Physical Device'] = [f"the {physical_device[0][1]}"]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = [f"the {environment_object[0][1]}"]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic\sstripe\scard|tap|hard\sdisk)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if external_system:
        entities['External System'] = [f"the {external_system[0][1]}"]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(to|can|shall|have|be)\s+(edit|create|add|change|update|delete)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'] = [f"to {system_requirements[0][1]}"]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(create|add|edit|change|update|delete)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [f"{shared_phenomena[0]}"]

    return entities

# Test the function
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical System': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+\w+\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+\w+\s+the\s+\w+\s+system', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.split('the ')[1] for match in software_systems]
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+get/send/receive\s+data/information\s+from\s+a\s+\w+\s+device', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.split('a ')[1] for match in physical_devices]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+get/send/receive\s+data/information\s+from\s+the\s+\w+', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.split('the ')[1] for match in environment_objects]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+get/send/receive\s+data/information\s+from\s+a\s+\w+\s+database', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.split('a ')[1] for match in external_systems]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+\w+\s+add\s+\w+\s+or\s+change\s+\w+\s+parameter\s+settings', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.split('add ')[1] for match in system_requirements]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+get/send/receive\s+data/information\s+from\s+the\s+\w+\s+password', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.split('the ')[1] for match in shared_phenomena]
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Upon correct submission of her password, she uses an intuitive web forms interface to update the system to her desiring."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(a [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(the [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+ object)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(a [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(the [A-Z][a-z]+ shall be provided with|the [A-Z][a-z]+ shall be prompted for|the [A-Z][a-z]+ shall be able to)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(the [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+ and|the [A-Z][a-z]+ or|the [A-Z][a-z]+,|the [A-Z][a-z]+;)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

```python
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-\d+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in software_systems]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in physical_devices and object not in software_systems]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in software_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in physical_devices and requirement not in environment_objects and requirement not in external_systems and requirement not in software_systems]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in physical_devices and phenomenon not in environment_objects and phenomenon not in external_systems and phenomenon not in software_systems]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ing\b|\b[a-z]+s\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ing\b|\b[a-z]+s\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(system|software)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(device|computer|machine|system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(object|thing|item|entity|phenomena|event|state|value)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|card|disk|system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(requirement|aim|purpose|goal|objective)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(event|state|value|phenomena|shared|common)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in shared_phenomena]

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[to|initialize|place|launch|supply|power|time|seconds|within|operations|state|system|functionality|necessary|startup|mode|normal]\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sevent\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The system continuously listens for a mouse click event during the playback."))
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bthe system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bkeyboard\b|\btrackball\b|\bplayer\'s screen\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe movie\b|\bthe patient\b|\bthe sun\b|\bthe old\b',
        'External System': r'\bRS-170A video interface\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\badjustable by the operator\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\boutput and input analog imagery\b|\boverlays to and from a Video Cassette Recorder (VCR) for recording and playback\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, value in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find the entity
        if re.search(value, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
            # If the entity is found, add it to the result dictionary
            result[key].append(re.search(value, sentence, re.IGNORECASE).group())

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(Center|game|movie|system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(CCTV|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(user|patient|sun|old|players|adventure|menu|screen|function key|on-screen colour|font|font size|game|movie)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(start|access|issue|switch|conclude|skip|transition|customise|change|layout|colour|font|font size|use|include|need|be able to)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(CCTV switching command|game settings|menu contents|layout of screens|use of function keys|on-screen colours|fonts|font sizes|start their adventure|access various game settings|the transition to the game's main menu)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "If the movie is skipped or once it concludes, the subsequent output is the transition to the game's main menu, where players can start their adventure or access various game settings."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|Each [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+|database|card|tap|hard disk)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(should|shall|have|provide|presents|serve|return|returning|initial|interface|starting|session)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(clear|sufficient|indication|position|structure|segment|overall|current|initial|interface|starting|session)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*have'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*for\s*activating\s*controls'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*who\s*prefer'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*software'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*present'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*that\s*presents'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s(device)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(patient|sun|old|user|Administrator)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s(database|magnetic\ stripe\ card|tap|hard\ disk|web\ page)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(add|change|initiate|redirect|execute)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(game|sequence|redirecting|player|choice|parameter|settings|actions|actions)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(game|system|application|interface|environment)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [f"{word} {entity}" for word, entity in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(computer|phone|device|screen|browser|window)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [f"{word} {entity}" for word, entity in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [f"{word} {entity}" for word, entity in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|card|tap|disk|page|window)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [f"{word} {entity}" for word, entity in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(aim|purpose|design|platform|capabilities)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [f"{word} {entity}" for word, entity in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(event|state|value|redirection|capabilities)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [f"{word} {entity}" for word, entity in shared_phenomena]
``` 

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
```

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

```python
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bplayer\b|\bgame\b|\bgameplay\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bdatabase\b|\bcard\b|\bhard disk\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bengage\b|\bfollow\b|\brelate\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\bquestion\b|\bnarrative\b|\bstoryline\b'

    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Define the regular expressions for each entity type
    software_system_regex = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_regex = r'\b[0-9]+\b'
    environment_object_regex = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'
    external_system_regex = r'\b[0-9]+\b'
    system_requirements_regex = r'\b[can|should|must|will|to|be|have|do|is|are|am|has|have|had|does|does|did|will|would|shall|should|may|might|must|ought|shall|should|can|could|may|might|must|ought|shall|should]\b'
    shared_phenomena_regex = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'

    # Find all matches for each entity type
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_regex, sentence)
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_regex, sentence)
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_regex, sentence)
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_regex, sentence)
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_regex, sentence)
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_regex, sentence)

    # Add the matches to the schema
    schema['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    schema['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    schema['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    schema['External System'] = external_system_matches
    schema['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    schema['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    # Return the schema as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(schema)

# Test the function
```

import re

```python
    # Physical Device

    # Environment Object
``` 

```python
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in software_systems:
        if word.lower() in ['game', 'system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append(word)
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in physical_devices:
        if word.lower() in ['plot', 'player', 'narrative']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(word)
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in environment_objects:
        if word.lower() in ['player', 'game']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(word)
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in external_systems:
        if word.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(word)
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in system_requirements:
        if word.lower() in ['challenge', 'narrative', 'skills']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(word)
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in shared_phenomena:
        if word.lower() in ['mathematical', 'game']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(word)
    
    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s(device)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(object|entity|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s(database|card|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s(requirement|aim|purpose)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s(event|state|value|journey|decision|point)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ object\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ system\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ for [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

```python
    for word in software_systems:

            entities['Software System'].append(word)

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in physical_devices:
        if word.lower() in ['mouse', 'clicks', 'device']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(word)

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in environment_objects:
        if word.lower() in ['scene', 'menu']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(word)

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in external_systems:
        if word.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(word)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in system_requirements:
        if word.lower() in ['exit', 'return']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(word)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in shared_phenomena:
        if word.lower() in ['clicks', 'exit', 'return']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(word)

    return entities
``` 

import re
```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(The|this|a|an)\s+(component|system|GUI|game)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(a|an)\s+(device|computer|phone|tablet)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(a|an)\s+(user|player|patient|sun|old)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|card|disk|tap)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(allow|delete|enter|exit|close|revisit)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(enter|delete|exit|close|revisit|content|session)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|the)\s+(system|tool|interface|page|device)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(a|the)\s+(button|device|tap|card|disk)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(a|the)\s+(user|patient|sun|old|group)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|the)\s+(database|card|disk|page)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(make|ensure|provide|improve|increase)\s+(access|information|efficiency|understanding)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [f"{match[0]} {match[1]}" for match in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(the|a)\s+(content|navigation|information|process|update)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [f"{match[1]} {match[2]}" for match in shared_phenomena]

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Device|Machine|Computer|Hardware)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(Environment|Object|Entity|Thing)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(System|Database|Card|Disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(Requirement|Need|Purpose|Aim)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(Phenomena|Event|State|Value)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|The [A-Z][a-z]+ component|the system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a device|a tap|a magnetic stripe card|a hard disk)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|the old|the patient|the sun)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a database|a browser interface|a tap|a magnetic stripe card|a hard disk)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(help in navigating|easy access|provide players with easy access)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(a set of shared events|a set of shared states|a set of shared values)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```
