import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s+\w+\s+System)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+ing|able|ible|ful|less|ly|ment|ness)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+ing|able|ible|ful|less|ly|ment|ness)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(user|interface)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(easy|efficient|intuitive|seamless|relevant|broader|supplemental)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bcomputer|device|system|machine|server|network|database|database|disk|card|tap|hard disk\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe [a-z]*\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bshould|can|will|must|is|are|be|has|have|had|do|does|did\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',

        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+(s)?\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+(s)?\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+(s)?\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+(s)?\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(system|system\))'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[0].strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(device|device\))'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0].strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(the|an|a|a\s)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[0].strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(interface|database|card|disk|tap|stripe|card|stripe\))'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[0].strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(to|can|must|should|have|be|perform|do|get|send|receive|store|submit|log|browse|play|restore|download|upload|sync|sync\))'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0].strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0].strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )+(?:system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )+(?:device|machine|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )+(?:object|entity|thing)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )+(?:system|database|card|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )+(?:requirement|goal|aim|purpose)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )+(?:event|state|value|phenomenon)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(CCTNS|main|Flash)\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(hard|digital)\s+copy\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(video|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(for|to)\s+(formatting|storing|internally|routing|recording|creating|storing|retrieving|displaying|printing|processing)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(for|to)\s+(export|dissemination|digital|imagery)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(device|computer|machine|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|environment|object)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|card|tap|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(requirement|aim|purpose|system|develop)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
